name: moire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
cloth, especially silk, with a pattern on the surface that looks similar to waves on water: She was wearing a stunning backless dress made out of moire.
Twoellis/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe wedding dress was in silk chiffon moire. My gown was of grey moiré, ornamented with gold lace.The quilt is a sumptuous confection of velvet and moire taffeta.The models paraded in baby-doll dresses in candy-pink stripes and sea-green silk moire.
